author: LGR
description:
Taking a look at Creative Insights ScreenToyz! Gimmicky mid 90s peripherals that plug into a computer keyboard port letting you control "interactive screensavers"... so, a game then, right? Ha. Yeah they sure tried something, charged $50 for it, failed spectacularly, and that's how you end up on LGR 30 years later.

● LGR things elsewhere:

title: 1994 ScreenToyz Interactive Screensaver 🎃 An LGR Halloween Thing
